bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bai tu 白禿 , white baldness, resembling the appearance of a preserved pear. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fei zao jia 肥皂莢 quoting Pu ji fang 普濟方 : 大人小兒禿剌黎 溜膿 , “For adults and children with baldness, la - li (i.e. a phonetic transliteration of 臘梨 , la li , with two characters meaning, among other things, “cut and black”) and beginning putrescence”, writes: 臘梨頭瘡：不拘大人小兒 , “ Preserved pear and head sores, regardless of whether adults or children are affected”.
